fields.name: apiPath
fields.label: API Path
fields.helpText: Path to the api, usually /api

fields.name: categories
fields.label: Categories
fields.helpText: Drop down list, leave blank to disable standard/daily shows

fields.name: animeCategories
fields.label: Anime Categories
fields.helpText: Drop down list, leave blank to disable anime

fields.name: animeStandardFormatSearch
fields.label: Anime Standard Format Search
fields.helpText: Also search for anime using the standard numbering

fields.name: additionalParameters
fields.label: Additional Parameters
fields.helpText: Please note if you change the category you will have to add required/restricted rules about the subgroups to avoid foreign language releases.

fields.name: multiLanguages
fields.label: Multi Languages
fields.helpText: What languages are normally in a multi release on this indexer?

fields.name: failDownloads
fields.label: Fail Downloads
fields.helpText: While processing completed downloads Sonarr will treat these selected filetypes as failed downloads.

fields.name: minimumSeeders
fields.label: Minimum Seeders
fields.helpText: Minimum number of seeders required.

fields.name: seedCriteria.seedRatio
fields.label: Seed Ratio
fields.helpText: The ratio a torrent should reach before stopping, empty uses the download client's default. Ratio should be at least 1.0 and follow the indexers rules

fields.name: seedCriteria.seedTime
fields.label: Seed Time
fields.helpText: The time a torrent should be seeded before stopping, empty uses the download client's default

fields.name: seedCriteria.seasonPackSeedTime
fields.label: Season-Pack Seed Time
fields.helpText: The time a season-pack torrent should be seeded before stopping, empty uses the download client's default

fields.name: rejectBlocklistedTorrentHashesWhileGrabbing
fields.label: Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing
fields.helpText: If a torrent is blocked by hash it may not properly be rejected during RSS/Search for some indexers, enabling this will allow it to be rejected after the torrent is grabbed, but before it is sent to the client.
